channel.title: FLF - Business 300
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Ep. 129 - Leading People (Even If You Can't Pay Them) - Part 3 [Business 300]
item.description: In order to lead others, you must be present with a Character of Gravitas. The presence of substantive character draws people in. The critical competency that every leader must excel at, if he is to have people follow him on his journey, is communication - the power of words.Gravitas, Vision, Words. It's what it takes to lead people, even if you can't pay them.
item.author: Philip Kulishov
item.itunes:author: Philip Kulishov

item.title: Ep. 128 - Leading People (Even If You Can't Pay Them) - Part 2 [Business 300]
item.description: The ability to lead others boils down to 3 things: the person, the focus, and the skill. The leader is someone who knows where he's going, knows how he wants to get there, and is making progress in that direction, whether or not he has others helping him. The leader is obsessed with the vision. He is building his future reality.
item.author: Philip Kulishov
item.itunes:author: Philip Kulishov

item.title: Ep. 127 - Leading People (Even If You Can't Pay Them) - Part 1 [Business 300]
item.description: Entrepreneurs trying to get a business off the ground have a lot going for them. But the one thing they need most, is mostly what they don't have. Money. So, what do you do if you need money and don't have it? The entrepreneur who doesn't have any money must rely on something more important: his ability to lead. A Character of Gravitas that pulls others in is what you need when leading people, even if you can't pay them.
item.author: Philip Kulishov
item.itunes:author: Philip Kulishov
